title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: More Things to Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     More Things to Do               More Things To Do         What is it? Birdwatchers at Kittatinny Point. NPS Photo  Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area is a unit of the National Park Service specifically intended for recreation, including activities such as ice and rock climbing, radio airplane flying, snowshoeing and cross country skiing, horseback riding, and bird and eagle watching. Birds & Raptors Cross-country Skiing & Snowshoe Horseback Riding Rock & Ice Climbing National Parks on the Delaware
